content: contemporary coaster a simple elegant coaster design this pattern uses us terminology i have included a us/uk conversion chart for quick reference designed by daina mickus you can find me on ravelry as dainamickus please feel free to email me at missyddesigns@gmail com i also have an etsy store http //www etsy com/shop/missyddesigns ref=si_shop copyright ©2014 missy d designs this pattern is not to be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission this pattern is for personal use only please email if you have any queries missyddesigns@gmail com items made with this pattern may be sold online please credit pattern contemporary coaster pattern size 11 5cm diameter hook 3 5mm hook yarn moda vera jalap 100% cotton recommended hook size 3 75mm us terms uk terms single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble treble_crochet abbreviations space/s = space/s slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch skip = skip repeat = repeat pattern i use 2 colours for this pattern colour a = cream colour b = grey using colour a start with a double magic/magic_ring round 1 chain 4 counts as first double_crochet plus chain 1 *1 double_crochet in ring ch1 repeat 10 times join with a slip_stitch to 3rd chain of ch4 12 double_crochet 12 ch1 sps round 2 single_crochet ch2 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet in next ch1 space or alternatively chain 3 double_crochet in ch1 space *ch1 2dc in next ch1 space repeat from * around join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain above single_crochet or top of ch3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 12 2dc/12 ch1 sps round 3 single_crochet ch2 counts as first double_crochet 2dc in next ch1 space or alternatively chain 3 2dc in ch1 space *ch1 3dc in next ch1 space repeat from * around join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain above single_crochet or top of ch3 finish off colour a 12 3dc sets 12 ch1 sps round 4 using colour b in any ch1 space use a standing single_crochet single_crochet in each st and ch1 space slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 48sc round 5 ch3 double_crochet in same st as slip_stitch ch1 *skip 1sc 2dc in next single_crochet ch1 repeat from * around slip_stitch in top of ch3 finish off colour b 24 sets of 2dc 24 ch1 sps round 6 using colour a start with a standing single_crochet in any ch1 space ch3 double_crochet in same space *single_crochet in next ch1 space ch3 double_crochet in same space repeat from * around slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 24 loops finish off and weave in ends page 2
